EmailTemplate.name: WBN-202209-HHS-HAC-HWBR-Virtual-Nursing-Webinar.reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Don’t forget to register for our virtual nursing webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly: WEBINAR Virtual nursing: How to address staffing challenges with a virtual care solution September 29 | 1 p.m. Eastern Register for our virtual nursing webinar to learn new strategies to address staffing shortages while supporting care team collaboration and increasing workflow efficiencies. About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
